analysis.key_quote: This Rule that will convert tens of thousands of civil service positions to at-will positions that can be fired without cause for political reasons will deeply damage our democracy and impede science-based decision making.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the undermining of democracy, and the negative impact on science-based decision making, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
